overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
PDF to PNG Converter is a free online tool that allows you to convert PDF files to high-resolution PNG images.
 PNG format has less quality degradation than JPG and supports transparent backgrounds, making it widely applicable for design, editing, web publishing, and print materials. Since you can extract each page as an image, it's also ideal when you want to use just a portion of a document. It's completely free and can be used immediately from either PC or smartphone.

steps.title: Upload PDF File
steps.description: Drag & drop the PDF file you want to convert, or upload it using 'Select File'.

steps.title: Automatic Conversion to PNG
steps.description: Each page will be converted into a high-quality PNG image individually.

steps.title: Download PNG Images
steps.description: Download PNG images individually by page or all together.

users.name: User A (Designer)
users.comment: "I needed to edit part of a PDF document in Photoshop, so being able to extract it as a PNG format was very helpful. The image quality is excellent!"

users.name: User B (Internal Communications Manager)
users.comment: "I wanted to use only part of the company newsletter as an image, so I converted it from PDF to PNG and pasted it into my presentation. It was easy and improved my work efficiency!"

users.name: User C (Freelance Web Developer)
users.comment: "I converted just the cover of a PDF sent by a client to PNG for use as a website thumbnail. The high image quality increases the level of trust."

items.title: Conversion to High-Resolution PNG with Transparent Background Support
items.description: Output PDFs in high-definition PNG format with minimal quality loss. High color accuracy ensures beautiful results for both print and web. Additionally, charts and graphics are converted with clarity.

items.title: Extract Each Page as an Image
items.description: Multi-page PDFs can be saved as individual PNG files. Use only the pages you need or repurpose them for slides, catalogs, e-commerce images, and more.

items.title: Seamless Integration with Editing Software
items.description: PNG works excellently with image editing software like Photoshop and Canva. You can directly use the converted images for editing, making document restructuring and customization simple.

items.title: Free, No Registration Required, Mobile-Friendly
items.description: No software installation or account registration required. Simple design that anyone can use immediately, with support for access from smartphones and tablets.

questions.question: Q1. Will all pages of my PDF be converted?
questions.answer: A. Yes, all pages will be automatically converted as PNG images. You can also choose to save only specific pages if needed.

questions.question: Q2. Will the PNG have a transparent background?
questions.answer: A. This is only supported if the original PDF contains transparency information. Normally, output will include backgrounds.

questions.question: Q3. What's the advantage of converting to PNG instead of JPG?
questions.answer: A. PNG is uncompressed with less quality degradation and supports transparent backgrounds, making it ideal for designs and printed materials.

questions.question: Q4. Can I convert large files?
questions.answer: A. Yes, we support files up to a certain size, but very large files may take longer to convert.

questions.question: Q5. Are uploaded PDFs saved?
questions.answer: A. No, uploaded files are automatically deleted after a certain period following conversion. We respect your privacy.
